title: A dark path, Forsaken Jayce does tread

replies.body:
What the hell does Runescape have to do with this?

as well**
server**
moderators**
administrators**
the craziest**
Riot, not League of Legends
wishes**

Why would a Pharaoh become an assassin, when they could just pay others to risk their lives for the Pharaoh's own cause?

The definition of Pharaoh means Rules/King of the Egyptian ages'. They never needed any form of currency, just a ranking system like say... "The Government" . Those who went against or were slack, get whipped regardless.

And why not? There's a profile-image with 2 Pyramids? Surely there is a Champion that can be based as a Pharaoh?

And make Kalista' Jet Black fire ;)

OT: Everything is cool, in check. But the "Base Teleportation" and "Acceleration Gate" is still in Blue...
Anyone thought that Jayce's hammer stance looks like War from Darksiders?

Well I know the Forsaken skins are a great concept and all but it leads one to wonder if they will make more Chosen skins as well, I think a Chosen Yasuo or Chosen Irelia would be cool if were going with a Ionian theme for the chosen skins

Maybe Chosen Shen, dual lightsabers! {{champion:98}}
Yoda's voice, this is. A dark path, Forsaken Jayce does tread.

Dude I think Zed is already forsaken.
{{champion:238}}
lol i think so 2 forsaken zed would be cool.
Forsaken Draven and Darius would be cool
i would buy this if they buff him
hmmm if Ronan the Accuser is Jayce. Then maybe Thanos Kassadin? We already got lady death Soraka
If Forsaken are sorta like the Sith from Star Wars, plz make a Forsaken Wukong with a duel-sided lightsabre.
